alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Henderson; Kaufman; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 12:02PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kaufman, northwestern Henderson, central Ellis, southeastern Dallas and central Navarro Counties through 1245 PM CST... At 1201 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmer to near Blooming Grove. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ennis, Wilmer, Ferris, Palmer, Alma, Barry, and Bardwell Lake around 1205 PM CST. Corsicana and Combine around 1210 PM CST. Seagoville, Crandall, and Cottonwood around 1215 PM CST. Kaufman, Talty, and Grays Prairie around 1225 PM CST. Terrell and Seven Points around 1230 PM CST. Tool, Kemp, Flag Lake, and Cedar Creek Reservoir around 1235 PM CST. Mabank and New Terrell City Lake around 1240 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Oak Valley, Dresden, Ola, Avalon, Elmo, Tolosa, Corbet, Rockett, Howard, and Rosser. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 492 and 508. Interstate 45 between mile markers 226 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
